title: doc: FileStat is dead
body:
FileStat is gone from src, but remains in doc:

$ grep -r FileStat src doc
doc/devel/weekly.html:  turn FileStat.Sys into a method on FileInfo (thanks Gustavo
Niemeyer).
doc/devel/weekly.html:holding is actually an *os.FileStat, and that it's Sys field is
actually a
doc/devel/weekly.html:       dev := fi.(*os.FileStat).Sys.(*syscall.Stat_t).Dev
doc/go1.html:implementation of the <code>FileInfo</code> interface,
<code>*os.FileStat</code>,
doc/go1.tmpl:implementation of the <code>FileInfo</code> interface,
<code>*os.FileStat</code>,
